titleStmt.title: The life of Henry the Second: King of England. Shewing what troubles befell in his raigne, concerning the warres betweene him and his subjects, and also the manner how he set up his standerd neere Rudland, Henry of Essex being his generall, and the manner how he left his crowne; necessary to be observed in these dangerous and distracted times of ours.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
